pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Bitwig Studio is a professional multi-platform music-creation system for production, performance, and DJing. It features a modern interface with a focus on flexible editing tools and a super-fast workflow.
Key features include: - Advanced audio and MIDI editing - Hybrid track concept combining audio, instrument, and effect tracks - Modular device system with The Grid for custom instruments and effects - Advanced clip launcher for live performance - Comprehensive mixing and mastering tools - Native Linux support with JACK and ALSA - Support for VST2, VST3, and CLAP plugins - Built-in devices, effects, and instruments - Multi-display and touch support

use.flag: Enable 32-bit plugin bridging support for loading 32-bit VST plugins in the 64-bit application

Use JACK2 as the audio backend (traditional JACK implementation)
Use PipeWire with JACK SDK as the audio backend (modern, recommended)
